overview: Charleys Surplus, the online Army Navy Store specializes in mostly U.S. military items, Weapons Accessories and its parts and has a wide selection of interesting surplus products like ACU Uniforms, Military Pants, Military Backpacks, Tactical Bags, Army Field Gear, WWII Field Gear, Kabar Knives, etc.
